Farmington_Hills.The Art Institute of Michigan:
Opened in 2007, The Art Institute of Michigan is a nonprofit institution owned and operated by Dream Center Education Holdings (DCEH), LLC. Located in the Detroit suburb of Novi, Michigan, The Art Institute of Michigan is accredited by the Higher Learning Commission of the North Central Association of Colleges and Schools.
The Art Institute of Michigan is one of The Art Institutes, a system of 31 educational institutions located throughout North America, providing education in design, media arts, fashion and culinary arts.
